original_title: Hans Dorrestijn & Martin van Dijk: Het Naakte Bestaan
overview: Stage registration of the theatreprogram by Dutch musical comedian Hans Dorrestijn and composer Martin van Dijk. The performance takes place in a "madhouse". Dorrestijn is hospitalized because of his suicidal thoughts and Van Dijk for hallucinations as a result of alcohol delirium.
title: Hans Dorrestijn & Martin van Dijk: Het Naakte Bestaan
